kw.name: Open Config In Browser
kw.msg: Opening browser 'chrome' to base url 'https://qa.letsdochinese.com/KJTCore/resources/adherenceadjustment.html'.

kw.name: Login And Redirect
kw.msg: Logging in using acalimag and kjt
Typing text 'acalimag' into text field 'id:username'.
Typing text 'kjt' into text field 'id:password'.
Clicking element 'id:login'.
Opening url 'https://qa.letsdochinese.com/KJTCore/resources/adherenceadjustment.html'

kw.name: Get User Details
kw.doc: TODO: Create a database query to retrieve the Agent's UID.
kw.msg: Creating a new connection.

Executing query. SELECT u.username, um.position, ul.code, ul.location, um.workforceid FROM kjt.usermeta AS um JOIN kjt.user AS u ON um.uid = u.uid JOIN kjt.userlocation AS ul ON um.lid = ul.lid WHERE u.username = %s;
${result} = {'username': 'ACALIMAG', 'position': 'ENGINEERING', 'location_code': 'MNL', 'location': 'Manila', 'workforceid': '12061'}
